version_description: - new rings have been added to the catalogue
- new ring has been added to the catalogue

- fixed problem with incorrect ring size drawing on iPhone 6 Plus / iPhone 6S Plus
- new rings have been added to the catalogue

- new rings have been added to the catalogue
- some rings in the catalogue have been renamed

- new rings have been added to the catalogue
- some rings images in the catalogue have been updated

- ability to view a handdraw sketch and the photos of the rings in the catalogue have been added
- fixed some iOS 10 compatibility issues
- new rings have been added
- new rings have been added

- new rings have been added
- watermark to the ring renders has been added
- new rings have been added
- new rings have been added

- new wedding rings catalogue with more than 270 rings has been added
- new engagement ring designs have been added
- some changes in the interface
- iOS 11 compatibility update
- iPhone X support update
- minor changes in the user interface

- button to choose diamond for engagement ring has been added
- speed optimization for retrieving engagement and wedding rings prices
- some changes in the user interface
- new engagement rings have been added
- instagram feed tab has been added
-  fixed little issue with number of the posts in the Instagram feed
- links to the social networks have been updated
- contact information has been updated
- some visual issues under iOS 9 have been fixed
- iOS 12 and new iPhone Xs/XsMax compatibility update
- new rings have been added to the "Engagement Rings" catalog
- new rings have been added to the "Engagement Rings" catalog
- new rings have been added to the "Engagement Rings" catalog
- new rings have been added to the "Engagement Rings" catalog
- new rings have been added to the "Engagement Rings" catalog
- new rings have been added to the "Engagement Rings" catalog
- some bugs were fixed

- Instagram feed has been removed from the app
- added support for dark mode in iOS 13

- iOS 14 compatibility update
- added support for the new iPhone 12

- fixing issue with incorrect ring size in the Zoomed Mode for those iPhones that support it
- in the Ring Sizer expanded range of ring sizes to 16 (USA) / Z+7 (AU)
- ring catalog updated
- added the ability to send a message to WhatsApp on the screen with detailed information about the ring
- removed "WhatsApp" button on the screen with detailed information about the ring or diamond
- added a request form that appears when a button "Send E-mail Request" is pressed on the screen with detailed information about the ring.
